settings.company_info_text: We're passionate about creating high-quality mechanical keyboards that combine premium materials with thoughtful design. Our mission is to bring you keyboards that feel premium from day one.

settings.name: Lewis Toh
settings.title: Co-Founder & Designer
settings.bio: Passionate about mechanical keyboards and minimalist design. Lewis brings years of experience in product design and community building.

settings.name: Ben Luis
settings.title: Co-Founder & Engineer
settings.bio: Focused on the technical aspects of keyboard design and manufacturing processes. Ben ensures every Killer65 meets our quality standards.
